A C D G H I L M R S T U W 
All Classes All Packages

A

addChat(Chat) - Static method in class com.example.solocarry.controller.ChatController
This method adds a chat object into the Firestore "Chat" collection, it first create a reference to the database, and then the "chat" object will be stored into the database
addCode(Code, String) - Static method in class com.example.solocarry.controller.CodeController
This addCode method adds a code object into the Firestore "Code" collection, it first create a reference to the database, and then queries the Firestore database, the method uses the unique combination of User id and the code's hashcode.
addFriends(String) - Method in class com.example.solocarry.model.User
The addFriends method adds a new friend to the friends ArrayList of a specific User object.
addInvitation(Invitation) - Static method in class com.example.solocarry.controller.InvitationController
This addInvitation method adds an invitation object into the Firestore "Invitation" collection, it first create a reference to the database, and then queries the Firestore database through invitation ID extracted from the passed in object, the method only execute the adding operation and returns nothing.
addMessage(Message) - Method in class com.example.solocarry.model.Chat
The addMessage method adds a given message into a specific Chat object, it accepts one Message as input.
addRequests(Request) - Method in class com.example.solocarry.model.User
The addRequests method adds a new request to the request ArrayList of a specific User object.
addScore(int) - Method in class com.example.solocarry.model.User
The addScore method increases the score of a specific User object.
addUser(User) - Static method in class com.example.solocarry.controller.UserController
This method adds a user object into the Firestore "User" collection, it first create a reference to the database, and then queries the Firestore database whether the user given existed already, if Yes, the method replace the old user object with the new one, if no, the method will directly store the given user object in the database
addUser(FirebaseUser) - Static method in class com.example.solocarry.controller.UserController
This method is a pre-step before the adding process, since the given firebaseUser object should be converted into the User class before adding to the Firestore, so firstly, use transformFirebaseUser method to do the convertion.
